author: Sidney Cox
description: This White Lady riff uses peach liqueur in place of triple sec to make a lighter, fruitier elaboration.
name: Perfect Lady
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
